definition: to quench/to temper/to harden by quenching
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Distortion of automobile synchronizer gear sleeves will take place during the course of carburization and quenching.
sentences.chinese: 汽车同步器齿套在渗碳淬火后，发生变形。

sentences.english: The carbon tool steel was quenched into the different concentration of calcium chloride watery solution.
sentences.chinese: 对碳素工具钢采用不同浓度的氯化钙水溶液进行淬火。

sentences.english: Strip bainite is obtained under the condition of fog cooling.
sentences.chinese: 在雾冷淬火条件下，获得了条状贝氏体。

sentences.english: Steel with low carbon content will not respond appreciably to hardening treatment.
sentences.chinese: 含碳量低的钢对淬火处理没有明显的反应。

sentences.english: Study on nuclease activity with fluorescence quenching probe.
sentences.chinese: 用荧光淬火双链探针研究核酸酶的活性。

sentences.english: Some of Ni will enter into the reticular boride in the process of quenching.
sentences.chinese: Ni在淬火过程中会部分进入网状硼化物。

sentences.english: In 1969, the following enterprise by Beijing gage start light quenching.
sentences.chinese: 1969年，北京量具刃具厂开始采用光亮淬火。

sentences.english: Quenching is one of the main ways to prolong the lifespan of switch rails.
sentences.chinese: 道岔尖轨淬火是提高其使用寿命的主要途径之一。

sentences.english: A new method is introduced in this paper on bright quenching oil without additives.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一种研制无添加剂光亮淬火油的新方法。

sentences.english: Anneal means make harden steel soft and remove brittleness.
sentences.chinese: 退火就是使淬火钢变软并消除其脆性。

sentences.english: The characters of rail out-line quenching are presented which is achieved at Baotou Steel.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了包钢新建钢轨离线全长淬火工艺的特点。

sentences.english: Construction and character of semicontinual vertical aluminium material quenching furnace were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍半连续立式铝材淬火炉的结构及特性。

sentences.english: On quenching, BZN- based cubic fluorite phase precipitates from the liquid phase.
sentences.chinese: 在淬火冷却时，液相中析出BZN系立方萤石相。

sentences.english: They made a material that is extremely light, yet tougher than hardened steel and, of course, it's transparent!
sentences.chinese: 这种材料甚至比淬火钢还要坚硬，而且它是透明的。

sentences.english: Quenching the excess lithium metal was achieved with isoprene.
sentences.chinese: 锂金属淬火超额实现与异戊二烯。

definition: to temper (iron)/to flare back/flareback (in a gas burner)/(of an engine) to backfire
to straighten/(fig.) to mend one's ways
after hard work and numerous revisions (idiom)/the vicissitudes of life
